article.title: Virginia Company to Support Persistent Surveillance in Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Technology and Supply Management Limited Liability Corporation (TaSM LLC), Alexandria, Virginia, is being awarded a $12,997,152 firm-fixed-price task order under a previously issued basic order agreement for 52 Persistent Ground Surveillance System operators at forward operating bases throughout Afghanistan for the U.S. Army.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
